Name: SPillai
Title: A huge facility for holding conferences
Review: A big convention centre with all the multi-media facilities. Adjacent Novotel hotel offers good boarding and lodging options.

Name: Ritu jha
Title: Stay experience
Review: Thank you for making my stay wonderful I would like to thanks Ms. Sweety who was a helping hand always.

Name: DipuKV
Title: Massive
Review: HICC is a massive complex which is nicely built and well maintained. The approach road is scenic as well.

Name: Talent P
Title: state-of-the-art convention facility
Review: State-of-the art IT infrastructure, design, technology, telecommunications and AV equipment with a spacious pre-function foyer area and an In-house 5-star banqueting serviceIt is connected to Novotel international business hotel

Name: DrValliappan
Title: Best Convention Facility in India
Review: Compared to Pragati Maidan, New Delhi or CODISSIA Trade Fair Complex, Coimbatore or Convention Centre, Chennai which are pioneering facilities in the country, HICC stands out as the best with all amenities and a 5-Star Hotel (Novatel) built in.

Name: PKB
Title: One of the best Convention
Review: No dowt, this is one of the largest and best. many global tourist come for events. I participated. very well arrangement. Attached with Novotel

Name: diptendubt
Title: The best part of modernity
Review: Located north to the Hitech City, HICC at Novotel hotel is the best place for the International conference like 50 Union world Lung Health conference

Name: Venuprasath
Title: Sarvsri Catering for the Marriage function
Review: We were their to service our client for their house wedding and the facilities and support given by the convention center and also the security services made us comfortable.  Well lit and spacious halls.  Including the security gate personal were helpful in making the event a great success.

Name: Honey shah
Title: Shaswat,Karthik ,Aditya Gopal, Sudheer, saqib, Vamsi,teethi
Review: A perfect package!Amazing hospitality, very helpful and prompt staff, very approachable... amazing g property, tasty food, ... always been a pleasant stay ,fun filled and memorable..thank you team HICC

Name: moogul818
Title: Wonderful Convention Centre
Review: Hyderabad International Convention Centre (HICC) is a purpose-built, state-of-the-art convention facility, the first of its kind in South Asia. It features a pillar less internal hall measuring 6,480 square meters that can be partitioned into six smaller halls. It boasts of a state-of-the art IT infrastructure, design, technology, telecommunications and AV equipment. HICC is connected (and managed by) Novotel Hyderabad Convention Centre, an international business hotel.

Name: mustafa zakir
Title: I visit HICC regularly for entinding the exibtions and events over there.
Review: Each time I was amazed by there organizing of the event and everything they do the makes the event and expo there one of the best events.

Name: Stay282088
Title: Meetings, Exhibitions & Conferences
Review: This is a great place for organising various exhibitions with state of the art facilities. Mostly all the events are organised in 2 Big Halls.

Name: Praveen
Title: Superb convention center
Review: It's been pleasant and wonderful experience to be part of my team meeting in this hotel. Has great infrastructure and good environment

Name: Ravi P
Title: HITECH POULTRY EXHIBITION 2019
Review: Visited HITECH international convention center for Poultry India show 2019 edition, had business meeting with several international  visitors, ending up with good business tieups with African visitors

Name: Vikas Singh
Title: Ample parking space
Review: The best thing about the venue is ample parking space. The halls are well spaced out so that you do not feel claustrophobic. Many popular events like the Petex and Comic con are organized here.

Name: Amashnee S
Title: Excellent Venue
Review: Attended a conference that was held at the International  convention center held in 29October-02 November 2019. The venue is large and adequately accommodated multiple sessions concurrently. Technically there were no interruptions and all talks proceeded well.

Name: sree143in
Title: Good Palce
Review: Hitex is a very large function hall like, we can arrange big meetings, wedding functions, political meetings and many more.

Name: Lakshmi Narayanan
Title: Hospitality
Review: I stayed in Novatel Convention center on 13 and 14th Sep for a business trip.Mr. Sudheer who was in front desk was very friendly and highly professional. I wish Novatel management take note of this feedback and encourage such young employees with recognition and motivation.ThanksLakshmi Narayanan

Name: NAZEER SHAIK
Title: Landmark for every visit
Review: Hyderabad is the main place for IT People. this place is the shortcut for all it peoples traveling for Kukatpally side

Name: jainms
Title: Hitex
Review: Most of the goverment, corporate exhibitions, meetings, conventions are held here. Located opposite Shilparamam.

Name: Gaurav G
Title: It's a good exhibition center
Review: I went there for a start up exhibition thinking it would be big but the rooms are not that big. I have been to a lot of exhibitions and the room sizes are in no comparison to this. It's okay for a small exhibition, don't expect a very big exhibition if they are not using other rooms as well.

Name: Ratna Kamalakar V
Title: Good for conventions
Review: It has huge halls and ample parking space. A decent place to conduct events with large gatherings. I don't think there are any options for food unless it is part of the event.

Name: Damian9712
Title: In a word “Fantastic” !!!!!!
Review: This is my first trip to india and like most people you may have a few doubts about the food , service and standards.Well this hotel would get 11 outta 10 if I could , the place is spotless and clean , rooms are spacious with well stocked minibars and modern air con systems, but the staff make it even better  ! Had the barbecue buffet tonight , food was top standard , Huthasini and Ajay looked after my every need ,really friendly and they made sure I tried all the additional dishes that were available, a big thank you to you both ! To sum up , if your thinking of staying in hyderabad area , do yourself a favour and book this place !

Name: beyondtravel
Title: Hitex Hyderabad
Review: A landmark of future at Hyderabad,  a gigantic convention centre,  know for exhibition and conference.  Also a pleasant place for morning walk along lakeside.

Name: TravelbuggIndia
Title: Convention Centre
Review: Hyderabad International Convention center which is also known as Hitex center is a prominent place where exhibitions and shows are held.

Name: Naresh
Title: Holiday trip
Review: We enjoyed with welcome drinks mr Sudeer who is in reception counter take care us and suggest nicely

Name: Sandy D
Title: Could have been better
Review: The convention center really needs a renovation as it appears jaded and used. While it is spacious - I did not find the facilities up mark.

Name: Vikram
Title: Great exhibition grounds and infrastructure for high impact commercial results
Review: I have utilized the facilities and found this to be a great facility to host Conferences, All Hands Meetings, and Company get-togethers. It is away from the city but close to the IT city. Good place for visitors to have relaxation and do business.

Name: rajvedula
Title: Great Exhibition Place
Review: Visited many times for exhibits/fairs, very clean place and well organized for parking and ample greenery... great morning walk place if you are in that area...(strictly before 730am only)

Name: Niya1315
Title: Not a tourist place
Review: HICC is spread in a big area. It is not a tourist place but a place for arranging conferences. Away from the city. I also visited this place to attend one conference.

Name: prasad r
Title: Very excited
Review: Good best place with family to visit Good best place with family to visitGood best place with family to visit

Name: Dilip kumar
Title: Best business meetings
Review: This place is for most bussiness meeting happenings in the city and is well organuised and well done

Name: yemKeyAre
Title: Good
Review: Good location for large conventions. Brilliant choices. Good for big event gatherings. Has plenty of parking space.

Name: Shaggy
Title: Awesome food
Review: Great food. Really enjoyed.it was a treat to me and my family. Will definitely comeback. You should try it

Name: Stuti Das
Title: Facilities good but food is pathetic
Review: The overall facility is very nice and the staff is friendly and helpful. The conference hall is spacious and is one of India’s largest hall. I’ll definitely recommend it for company conferences. But the food is pathetic and by second day you can predict the menu for next. Connectivity with the main city is good and you can easily get Ola/ über easily

Name: mighty7886
Title: Amazing place
Review: I attended a conference here and had an awesome experience. Far enough from the city's noises, this provides all the facilities for all types of conventions.

Name: Trending T
Title: Best for business events
Review: I visited this place for a business event conducted in october and this place has unique style of creating customer satisfactory things.

Name: mohamedriji
Title: Ideal place for conducting large events
Review: HICC is a huge property with state-of-the-art convention facility located in HiTech city. I visited this place to attend an event. The convention center as well as its surroundings are well maintained. The halls are huge. Lot of breakout rooms are also there. Novotel hotel is also adjacent to HICC. The convention center has ample parking space.

Name: Somarajan
Title: Great facilities and ambience
Review: Have visited this place during November 2018 for the SIP competition. This is a very large property with beautiful landscape. Convention hall is very big.

Name: Travel144090
Title: High quality restaurants
Review: Had really nice experience one of the restaurant offered really wide variety of Indian cuisine. High level service.

Name: 73prashantha
Title: great place for meetiings.
Review: This one is a great place for meetings. usually their exhibitions are good and you get to see a productive crowd around.

Name: Daniel T
Title: Worth visiting during a business event
Review: HICC as its more famously called, this convention centre has given Hyderabad-based industries a good platform to host industry-level summits.The facilities are ideal for conferences, technical shows etc. Place is accessible via public transport as well.

Name: Nish0901
Title: Near Hitech City
Review: Hyderabad International Convention Center is spread in a very big area. I visited this place to attend one conference. The auditorium inside is big and can hold good gathering. It is not a tourist place.

Name: Khyati
Title: Amazingly big
Review: Huge big conference Hall and which can cater to almost 2000 people at a time.. seminars.. meetings. Events for all this is the best place..

Name: srinath18
Title: Hyderabad hitex
Review: Icon of the Hyderabad is hitex..it located near hitex city..IT area in Hyderabad Hitex is most popular in Hyderabad and It carridor area

Title: Excellent!
Review: Visited when  martin garrix was in town!A very well maintained and clean place. Can handel even 10-15 k  audience.

Name: Kishor K
Title: Truely international
Review: one of the best convention center in India. the standards are kept to match any international convention center. layout is good, rest rooms, dining, convention hall , everything is good.

Name: SRIKAKOLAPU
Title: good
Review: Expos and shows happen over here.Parking place is fine and people guide you over there.nice and well maintained

Name: Pithva_Rajan
Title: Totally up to the mark.
Review: Good place for exhibition in Hyderabad. However it is located far from the Airport. Shuttle bus facilities are available but not that frequent. I recommend to chose OLA or UBER cab for transporataion.

Name: Zbyněk Z

Name: Santosh1959

Review: It is one of the first and the best convention centers of India. It can comfortably take about 10000 guests without crowding.Well planned and built in a huge area with ample parking

Name: Pranay9518
Title: Best hotel to stay
Review: Hotel is very good and services is best and upto mark and nice room service and nice room and the view is also good if you want to stay nice place I will recommended you all to go and stay there nice place to stay and nice view and orientation of room and best services and nice people and you can stay with family and friends and business meetings to

Title: Big function hall

Name: deepa v

Review: The place is quite big and hosts many different kinds of events from time to time.located in the heart of the city.

Name: Karthik Dasu
Title: Good place
Review: It is a good place to visit. It is located right in the heart of Hitech City.Not a must watch place.

Name: Navneet Nayak
Title: Nice place compared to others
Review: It is spacious enough to fit about more than 500 people at a time. Though not that big, but the best as compared to the other options you have.

Name: Abhilash K
Title: Very large
Review: It is very large convention center In the Hyderabad major government related program are done here..

Name: venkatakarthik
Title: go to place to attend events
Review: it's clean and spacious enough to fit about >500 people in there, no issue with valet parking, great place. enjoyed the stay....

Name: TravelingGypsy0508
Title: Best for corporate events
Review: Have attended so many events hosted by my company at HICC. It is spacious, parking isn't an issue and centrally located.

Name: naliniranjann
Title: Convention Centre of Choice in Hyderabad
Review: World class convention centre in Hyderabad to stay in and enjoy the wonderful Business conferences and Business Meet. Very much connected to all types of transport and all in one Campus to organise business meet and conference, as well as staying accommodation at the same campus. Very good food as well and shopping centres to have the Hyderabad Pearls in side the Convention Centre.

Name: Shivadhar
Title: Truly Corporate
Review: One of the best places in Asia to organise a truly professional conference, seminar, event, etc. Located in the center of the city with almost all possible facilities.

Name: jmodi1981
Title: Nice Place for various events
Review: One of the very good convention center to host events at this place. It has very big halls to hold grand functions here.

Name: Chetan V
Title: Ideal option for marketing events
Review: I attended marketing and user group events during Dec 2017 and April 2018 at HICC complex. It can accommodate 500-2000 attendees across multiple halls. Decent Wifi (paid service) as well.I noticed marriage reception during the evening times.Overall, good experience and there's adjacent hotel (entry from inside the HICC complex) i.e. Novotel with restaurants and cafe at the lobby level.

Name: Dheeraj B
Title: Comic Con!
Review: The Annual Comic Con!Who doesnt go here?It is one of the spacious halls where all sorts of conventions are hosted.

Name: Kirun K
Title: Highly desirable
Review: I have visited HICC on March 23rd for some function.It is spacious and large enough to accommodate good number of people.I visited HICC for some event and enjoyed a lot.Also neat by they have Novotel hotel (5 star) very spacious and ambience is superb.It is located at hitex near by Hi Tech City.If any body wants to visit Hyderabad you must visit the place like HICC,hitex and Novotel.

Name: Known Traveller
Title: Largest Convention in Hyderabad
Review: Largest Convention in Hyderabad, located at Hitech City. It is a place for International Events and shows.

Name: Pulak
Title: All mega trade fairs take place
Review: The Hyderabad International Convention Center is very huge with state of the art facilities for exhibition.

Name: Gugan_Ilango

Review: this is the modern symbol of hyderabad and symbol of hi tech city. its the entry way to novotel and hicc complex

Name: Bawi Backpacker
Title: Good Location
Review: Came here for an exhibition. It is quite well maintained also the property has hotels within and is close to quite a few hotels and corporate offices. Food is easily available thankfully.

Name: debasis d
Title: Well maintained international complex
Review: This place is famous for exhibition , conference, seminar. Huge space, car parking, excellent food and professional atmosphere. Though costly but worth the investment.

Name: Madhavi74
Title: Hitex
Review: The Hyderabad International Convention Center is located in Novotel and Hicc Complex | Near Hitech City, Po Bag, Hyderabad.It is very famous and very big convention ceter in hyderabad. And also famous for VIP events.

Name: krutarthasahoo
Title: Exhibition
Review: It is located in the Hi-tech city of Hyderabad which is know as Cyberabad, located in the IT Park of the Hyderabad.

Name: koteswararao
Title: center place for costly exhibtion
Review: any  businessmen want to have exhibition first think about this at Hyderabad in the standed of national level

Name: Surya Katakam
Title: Best place in Hyderabad for Exhibition and Business Shows
Review: This is located near to Cyber towers. Most of the national and international business exhibitions and seminars will happen here.It is well maintained and we'll connected to the city

Name: iamchathu
Title: Unite India and NGDC 2017 was held here
Review: Unite India game conference and NGDC 2017 was held in HICC. Good spacious event location and good lighting and sound too. We stayed at Novotel Hotel which was in same Building. Air condition also good and had a great high roof and velvet floors. Food was good but not best. We had Biriyani also which was average taste. Less seating area for Lunch. We didn't have free Wi-Fi

Name: Ideaboy
Title: Best place in India
Review: This is the best place in India to do any sort of Party / Conference / Official meetings etc...Attractive Area, almost 5000+ can accommodate in single hall and Excellent Sound system, Lights, arrangements, everything is best.Very clean and neat.I didn't seen any other place like this in India for Official conferences...Only drawback is PRICE, it costs huge.

Name: samM260RZ
Title: Nice and well maintained
Review: Its a nice and well maintained place with good facilities. Went here for an event and really likes this place

Name: SuvodipMoitra
Title: World Class
Review: Indeed a great convention centre for all purposes. Last to last week visited here for the Comic Con and the Kitchen expo. Facilities, parking and space is good. Adjacent there is Novotel.

Name: NITA N
Title: HICC Facilities
Review: We had the Skal Congress 2017 here and could not fault anything as far as the food and infrastructure goes. The only concern for me was that unlike other Conference facilities there was a charge for WIFI and this did not go down well at all with delegates.

Name: Rach R
Title: Pretty Good
Review: Your experience at the Convention Center depends on what you are visiting for. I had gone for Comic Con last year, and last week I went for Soul Sante. Both were really good experiences for me. The former was held indoors and the latter was held outdoors. If you know which exhibition to go for, it can really make your experience worth while

Name: pjanil1968
Title: Good exhibition centre
Review: Most of the major conventions and exhibitions like property exhibitions, Food exhibitions etc are conducted here.Well maintained exhibition halls

Name: Mohammed Sohail Ahmed
Title: Pathetic condition
Review: Few years back when it was constructed, it was an attraction. It is being hugely affected due to pollution.

Name: Ryan
Title: Nothing special about it
Review: It's a convention centre in hyderabad where expos and conferences conducted. There is nothing special about there construction or make. It is just another building. But, as far as hyderabad is concerned, it is the only place to conduct a decent fair or exhibition

Name: Dhulev
Title: Simply conventions
Review: I am told that this is the largest convention center in the country. I too attended a meeting in HICC recently. The main audi has a vast seating area. We had lunch at the ground floor. The taste of food and the verity is almost endless. Both North Indian as well South Indian dishes were quite fine. I tasted tomato soup , Veg Biryani, Tandoori Roti, Black daal, salads, papad, plain rice, kheer and much more in moderate quantities. Found all dishes quite good. However, the centre looked quite away from any of the city points. Its about 18 Km from Hussain Sagar lake but the road to the airport is relatively traffic free as you will travel on the Outer Ring Road most of the time. Its about 37 Km from the Rajiv Gandhi Airport.

Name: Floyd A
Title: Great place for any exhibitions
Review: HICC has a huge capacity to host exhibitions and conferences, it has a massive exhibition area and multiple rooms that can hold several other sessions. it is also connected to the Hotel Novotel and hence staying at the hotel is better if you are travelling for a 2-3 day conferece

Name: BRKanth
Title: Best Convension Center
Review: This is the only and the best convension centre in Hyderabad. Visited to attend business meet and it is must watch.

Name: nj09
Title: Nice.
Review: The hyderabad International convention centre is a really good place to stay. I have given a review on the novotel airport hotel, U can check it out. It is almost similar and amzing!

Name: Siva N
Title: Yes superb
Review: The place was pleasent cool and the environment in which it was built is awesome and mostly the internal architecture is awesome the seating present there was very comfortable and the servers and staff are exceedingly doing their work good

Name: Suryamoni A
Title: there are two cities in hyderabd I) oldcity II)new city III)the one your seeing is hi-tech city
Review: international events took place here like music concerts,comic com david guetta shows are performed here

Name: Azimjon_Vohid
Title: Good place for Exhibitions...
Review: I was here for Exhibition. Center is very suitable for conducting big scale events, such as: exhibitions, fairs, trade shows, workshops, etc.

Name: G S
Title: Big Convention for Big Celebrations
Review: we went here for our company day and it's big place and it's beside novetol hotel and place and parking area is quite enough and i really like this place

Name: Wholesome_life
Title: Spacious and grand
Review: HICC is big and can accommodate large events. I recently happened to attend a conference that hosted about 1000 delegates comfortably. Air Conditioning was good and consistent. The car pick up point tends to get congested at times during morning hours when lots of delegates get dropped at HICC. The biggest sore point was the food. Very average and nothing much to write about.

Name: Rajashekhar K
Title: One of the modern monuments of trade and technology
Review: One of the modern monuments of trade and technology, it embodies the newfound attitude of Hyderabad and today finds a place of pride. Situated on the outskirts of the city, it is the nucleus of Cyberabad, the IT destination in this part of the world. Cyber Towers is the main building here.

Name: NayanKothari
Title: Best place for conventions and conferences
Review: one of its kind place in the entire country for hosting huge conventions, social or business gathering. It also has inside novatel which has a huge conference hall.

Name: Rahul_and_Niyanta
Title: Banquet event
Review: I attended the Wedding Times Fashion Fiesta at HICC on Monday evening (20th March). I am a hotelier myself and have been privy to a number of such PR and media events at the various hotels that I have worked in. However, I must say, that the execution of the event on Monday evening on your end was exceptional. I am not referring to the actual fashion show or the event set p inside the hall. I am referring to the hospitality rendered to guests both, pre and post event. I was lucky enough to attend the after party on the first floor as well. All your staff was courteous and polite, and always smiling. I know Banquet staff is generally very stressed because of their long hours, not to mention handling a complimentary event. However, each and every one of them were brilliant. Always smiling and ready to extended any assistance. For instance, on a number of occasions, your staff ensured that our drinks were brought to us instead of us having to walk up to the bar. Snack service was prompt and if  we requested one of the boys to bring one of the other snacks on rotation, it was promptly brought. Bartenders remembered our drinks and made it promptly. I would like to mention a few gentlemen whose names I caught - Mohiuddin and Anand Ravi, both managers I guess because they were dressed in a jacket, and Saroj (snack server) and Ankush (bartender at the after party). Amongst others, these four brilliant people ensured that we had a memorable evening, one that will last in our collective memories for a long time. And not to forget the food - it was delicious. The chicken satay served at the after party were generous sized and succulent. The chicken biryani, the stew and appam, the anjeer ice cream and the tres leches dessert were all mouth watering, served at the right temperature and delicious. Again, staff was helpful enough to bring us bottles of water to accompany our dinner without being prompted. A classic example of brilliant service. Thank you once again and I do hope you will share my good wishes with your banquet staff to let them know how much we appreciated their efforts that evening.

Name: saradurban
Title: great meeting venue
Review: attended endo 2017 here .first meeting in india that we have attended and we thoroughly enjoyed the venue and meeting so different to european and american meetings!so generous and friendly smiles

Name: Pintya
Title: Best corporate events
Review: The center is large enough accommodate multiple events at a time. Infrastructure is excellent. Food is awesome.

Name: Dipubose
Title: one of the best exhibition centres in Town
Review: HICC is a nice place to rewind during some exhibitions.Visited during Kids Exhibitions & also during an interior expo.The have big pavilions & provides ample parking .Very well maintained
